channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about technology, programming and entertainment.

item.title: Polite and Inviting to Amazon Key and Sex Toys
item.description: Sam has been stricken with RSI, so the panel discusses techical whiteboard interviews, Amazon's in-home delivery service, disability depiction in X-Men comics, your wireless sex toy recording you, and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam has been stricken with RSI, so the panel discusses techical whiteboard interviews, Amazon's in-home delivery service, disability depiction in X-Men comics, your wireless sex toy recording you, and more!
item.itunes:summary: Sam has been stricken with RSI, so the panel discusses techical whiteboard interviews, Amazon's in-home delivery service, disability depiction in X-Men comics, your wireless sex toy recording you, and more!
item.itunes:author: Kenneth Love, Mike Overby, Sam Rose, and Daniel Lemmond
item.content:encoded: Show notes are live at whiletrue.fm/episodes/0003.html

item.title: A Very Cultural Introduction
item.description: Feedback from the inaugural episode told us to shape up and introduce ourselves. This is us, a mathematician's lament, playing/criticizing games, interviewing for internships, and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Feedback from the inaugural episode told us to shape up and introduce ourselves. This is us, a mathematician's lament, playing/criticizing games, interviewing for internships, and more!

item.content:encoded: Show notes are live at whiletrue.fm/episodes/0002.html

item.title: We Don't Do Segues Here
item.description: In this inaugural episode of whiletrue.fm, we discuss the Elm programming language, Hidden Figures, mechanical keyboards, walking simulators, bad segues and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: In this inaugural episode of whiletrue.fm, we discuss the Elm programming language, Hidden Figures, mechanical keyboards, walking simulators, bad segues and more!
